resources.string: Please feel free to contact us if you have questions, comments or suggestions about our manuals and procedures. Each of your business is unique. Write us with your unique requirements. Our experienced authors will try to give you directions on how to subscribe and how you could be most benefited. \n\nIf you have a general question about our procedures, subscription, payments or any other technical problems, please email us at ‘general@gmpsop.com’. We will respond to your query as soon as possible.
